spock.util
[Groovy] Class EmbeddedSpecRunner

java.lang.Object
  spock.util.EmbeddedSpecRunner

@NotThreadSafe
class EmbeddedSpecRunner

Utility class that allows to run (fragments of) specs programmatically. Mainly intended for spec'ing Spock itself.

Authors:
Peter Niederwieser
